title: Quantity of ice cream consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2012 , by age
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Consumption in grams, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Consumption in grams has stayed the same over the Year.
Consumption in grams is roughly constant from 1.5-3_years to 19-64_years, gradually increasing from 19-64_years to 4-10_years, and lastly roughly decreasing from 4-10_years to 65_years_and_over.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 19-64_years and 4-10_years.
Maximum Consumption in grams, about 13.0 was reported at Year 4-10_years
Minimum Consumption in grams about 5.0 was reached at Year 19-64_years

In general Consumption in grams has stayed the same over the Year.
Consumption in grams is roughly constant from 1.5-3_years to 19-64_years, gradually increasing from 19-64_years to 4-10_years, and lastly roughly decreasing from 4-10_years to 65_years_and_over.

The line drastically increased by 2.6 times from Year 19-64_years to 4-10_years.
